Hi, Im zge.

I write to make sense of ideas and to share the ones worth keeping.

This blog is a curated archive of essays, notes, and experiments across culture, technology, and the human side of the internet. Sometimes its deep dives, sometimes its quick observations but its always written with care.

What youll find here

  • Essays and reflections
  • Research-backed notes (with sources when possible)
  • Short things I learned posts
  • Occasional tools, templates, and experiments

Contact

If youd like to reach me, use the{' '} contact page {' '}or email:{' '} gulemeyenosgeguler@gmail.com

import type { Metadata } from 'next'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { LegalPage } from '@/components/legal/LegalPage'; import { ProseTableWrap } from '@/components/prose/Prose'; export const metadata: Metadata = { title: 'Cookie Policy', }; export default function CookiesPage() { return (

This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how they may be used on this website.

What are cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device. They may be used to provide core functionality, improve performance, and understand how the site is used.

Types of cookies

Category Purpose Status
Strictly necessary Required for core site functionality, security, and performance delivery (including Cloudflare). Used
Analytics Google Analytics cookies (e.g., _ga and related cookies) to measure traffic and usage patterns. Used
Marketing Advertising and tracking across sites. Not used

Managing cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.

Questions

For privacy-related information, see Privacy Policy.

); }

import type { Metadata } from 'next'; import Link from 'next/link'; import { LegalPage } from '@/components/legal/LegalPage'; export const metadata: Metadata = { title: 'Privacy Policy', }; export default function PrivacyPage() { return (

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use{' '} Your Blog ByOzge.

Site operator

Operator: zge Gler
Contact: gulemeyenosgeguler@gmail.com

Information we collect

  • Basic usage data: technical data such as IP address, user agent, and request metadata may be processed for security and reliability.
  • Newsletter data: if you subscribe, we collect your email address to send updates.
  • Contact messages: if you send a message through the contact page, we receive your message content and contact details you choose to provide.

How we use information

  • To operate, maintain, and secure the website.
  • To respond to messages and support requests.
  • To send newsletters if you opt in.
  • To understand traffic and improve content and usability.

Newsletter

If you subscribe to our newsletter, we use your email address to send updates. Every newsletter includes an unsubscribe link, and you can opt out at any time.

Analytics

We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use the website and to improve content and usability. Google Analytics may set analytics cookies{' '} and process usage data (such as pages viewed, approximate location, and device information). Data retention is handled as configured in our Google Analytics settings.

For details about cookies, see Cookie Policy.

Hosting and service providers

This website is hosted on Cloudflare Pages. Cloudflare may process limited technical data (such as IP address and request metadata) to deliver the site, improve performance, and help protect against abuse.

Contact messages

If you contact us through the contact page, your message is delivered to our email inbox ( gulemeyenosgeguler@gmail.com). We use this information only to respond and provide support. We retain messages as long as necessary for support and record-keeping, and delete them when no longer needed.

Sharing and third parties

We do not sell personal information. We may share limited data with service providers that help run the site (such as hosting and analytics), only as needed to provide the service.

International data processing

Service providers such as Cloudflare and Google may process data in countries other than your own. Where applicable, we rely on the safeguards and legal mechanisms provided by these providers.

Your choices

  • You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time using the link in our emails.
  • You can control cookies through your browser settings (see{' '} Cookie Policy).

Contact

If you have questions about this policy, please email{' '} gulemeyenosgeguler@gmail.com or use the{' '} contact page.

); }

These Terms & Conditions govern your use of Your Blog ByOzge. By accessing or using the site, you agree to these terms.

Use of the website

  • You may use the site for lawful purposes only.
  • You agree not to attempt to disrupt, damage, or gain unauthorized access to the site.
  • You agree not to misuse forms or submission features.

Content

Unless stated otherwise, the content on this site is owned by the site operator and is protected by applicable intellectual property laws. You may not copy, reproduce, or redistribute content without permission, except where allowed by law.

Related policies

Please review our Privacy Policy and{' '} Cookie Policy.

Third-party services

The site may use third-party services such as hosting (Cloudflare Pages) and analytics (Google Analytics). See our Privacy Policy and{' '} Cookie Policy for more details.

Disclaimer

The website is provided on an as is and as available basis. We do not make warranties of any kind, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of the content.

Limitation of liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, the site operator shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of the site.

Changes

We may update these terms from time to time. The Last updated date at the top of this page indicates when changes were made.

Governing law

These Terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Istanbul, Turkey.

Contact

If you have questions about these terms, please email{' '} gulemeyenosgeguler@gmail.com or use the{' '} contact page.

); }
